atd.pillage
Interface StatsCollector

All Known Implementing Classes:
StatsCollectorImpl
public interface StatsCollector

This is the interface that provides access to statistics. The idea is that there needs to be a read only interface to the stats to make sure that one process reporting or working with the stats doesn't reset them or screw them up for another process. Statistics can be aquired as a total or the delta between two snaps.

Method Detail

includeJvmStats

void includeJvmStats(boolean flag)
Indicate if this collector should collect jvm stats like heap, threads etc. By default this is off so it has to be turned on.

Parameters:
flag -

areJvmStatsIncluded

boolean areJvmStatsIncluded()
Indicate if jvm stats included in collections and summaries.

Returns:

getFullSummary

StatsSummary getFullSummary()
Return a full summary of stats since the start of collecting stats or since the last stats clear

Returns:
StatsSummary

getDeltaSummary

StatsSummary getDeltaSummary()
Return a summary of stats since the last collection. This method should return the same summary until the next time collect() is called

Returns:
StatsSummary

collect

StatsSummary collect()
Trigger a stats collection. A stats collection create a delta summary and pass this summary to all StatsReporters.

Returns:
StatsSummary

addReporter

void addReporter(StatsReporter reporter)
Add a reporter to this collector. If the reporter already exists, no exception should be thrown

Parameters:
StatsReporter - reporter

removeReporter

void removeReporter(StatsReporter reporter)
Remove a reporter from this collector. If the reporter doesn't exist, no exception should be thrown

Parameters:
StatsReporter - reporter
